mapper.select: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum, r.* from review r,(select @rownum:=0) as tmp where pno=#{pno} order by rno desc
select count(*) from review where pno=#{pno}
mapper.insert: insert into review(pno, id, scope, content, uuid, uploadpath, filename, image) values(#{pno},#{id},#{scope},#{content},#{uuid},#{uploadpath},#{filename},#{image})
